verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%> O clap <S%H8628><s%> your hands, <S%H3709><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you people; <S%H5971><s%> shout <S%H7321><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of triumph. <S%H7440><s%>
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> most <S%H5945><s%> high <S%H5945><s%> is terrible; <S%H3372><s%> he is a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He shall subdue <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> us, and the nations <S%H3816><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> our feet. <S%H7272><s%>
He shall choose <S%H977><s%> our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for us, the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he loved. <S%H157><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> is gone <S%H5927><s%> up with a shout, <S%H8643><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a trumpet. <S%H7782><s%>
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to God, <S%H430><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> praises: sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to our King, <S%H4428><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> praises.
For God <S%H430><s%> is the King <S%H4428><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> you praises with understanding. <S%H7919><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> reigns <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the heathen: <S%H1471><s%> God <S%H430><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of his holiness. <S%H6944><s%>

The princes <S%H5081><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> are gathered <S%H622><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> even the people <S%H5971><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham: <S%H85><s%> for the shields <S%H4043><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> belong to God: <S%H430><s%> he is greatly <S%H3966><s%> exalted. <S%H5927><s%>
